original_text: And he did that which was evil in the eyes of the Lord, according to all that Jehoiakim had done.
korean_text: 그가 여호야김의 모든 행위를 본받아 여호와 보시기에 악을 행한지라

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was evil
in the eyes of the Lord
according to all that Jehoiakim had done
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야김이 행한 모든 것 같이 하였더라
